Purpose: To detect genetic variants in the F11 gene associated with Hemophilia C (Factor XI Deficiency) using next-generation sequencing.
Container: Appropriate blood collection tube or sterile container for tissue (not explicitly specified in SOP)
Equipment: Next-Generation Sequencer, thermocycler (PCR machine), microcentrifuge, Bioanalyzer or Fragment Analyzer, pipettes, vortex mixer, laboratory computer system
